render.tex: \title{Three Set Results} Standard results involving three sets $A,B$ and $C$

reason.tex:
%text The following results can be proven graphically by representing three sets $A,B$ and $C$ in a Venn diagram Your textbook will have those proofs. So, we will just list these important results % \begin{align} \begin{tabular}{NN}
\hline \text{Union} & \left(A\cup B \right) \cup C = A\cup \left(B\cup C \right)\\ \hline \text{Intersection} & \left(A\cap B \right) \cap C = A\cap \left(B\cap C \right)\\ \hline \text{Mixed} & A\cap \left(B\cup C \right) = \left(A\cap B \right)\cup \left(A\cap C \right) \\ \hline & A\cup \left(B\cap C \right) = \left(A\cup B \right)\cap \left(A\cup C \right) \\ \hline \end{tabular} \end{align} %text %
